summary: Dashboard and Rent Settings features testing complete. Backend: 10/10 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All features verified and working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/dashboard returns 200 with correct structure
Backend: Combined outstanding = rent + loans calculation works
Backend: GET /api/profile returns rent settings with payment_deadline fields
Backend: Rent settings are persisted correctly
Backend: Rent settings validation rejects invalid deadline day (>28)
Backend: Dashboard income is based on payment_date (not period)
Frontend: Dashboard 'Openstaand' card shows combined amount (SRD 300,00)
Frontend: Dashboard 'Openstaand' shows subtitle 'incl. leningen SRD 300,00'
Frontend: Dashboard 'Inkomsten deze maand' shows SRD 2.700,00
Frontend: Sidebar 'Uitloggen' button is visible at bottom (y=1028)
Frontend: Betaaldeadline has 'Deadline in volgende maand?' dropdown
Frontend: Betaaldeadline preview shows example text
Frontend: 'Huurinstellingen Opslaan' button saves settings successfully

feature_1_dashboard_openstaand_combined.description: Dashboard 'Openstaand' card shows combined rent + loan outstanding amount (SRD 300,00)

feature_2_dashboard_openstaand_subtitle.description: Dashboard 'Openstaand' shows subtitle 'incl. leningen SRD 300,00' when loans are outstanding

feature_3_dashboard_income_this_month.description: Dashboard 'Inkomsten deze maand' shows correct income (SRD 2.700,00) based on payment_date

feature_4_sidebar_logout_visible.description: Sidebar 'Uitloggen' button is always visible at bottom with mt-auto and flex-shrink-0

feature_5_betaaldeadline_section.description: Huurinstellingen has 'Betaaldeadline' section with month offset and deadline day options

feature_6_betaaldeadline_preview.description: Betaaldeadline preview shows example like 'Huur van januari moet uiterlijk X februari betaald zijn'

feature_7_rent_settings_save.description: Rent settings can be saved with new deadline fields (payment_deadline_day, payment_deadline_month_offset)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard and Rent Settings features have been fully tested. Key findings: 1) Dashboard 'Openstaand' now shows combined rent + loan outstanding with subtitle showing loan portion. 2) Dashboard 'Inkomsten deze maand' is based on payment_date (not period_month/period_year). 3) Sidebar logout button is fixed at bottom with mt-auto and flex-shrink-0. 4) Huurinstellingen has new Betaaldeadline section with payment_deadline_day and payment_deadline_month_offset fields. Test data: Jan Jansen with SRD 2500 rent paid, SRD 300 loan remaining, total income SRD 2700 for Jan 2026.

dashboard_api.GET /api/dashboard: Returns total_outstanding (rent), total_outstanding_loans, total_income_this_month (based on payment_date)

rent_settings_api.GET /api/profile: Returns rent_due_day, payment_frequency, grace_period_days, payment_deadline_day, payment_deadline_month_offset
rent_settings_api.PUT /api/profile/rent-settings: Updates all rent settings including new deadline fields
